title: Flagrantly Unconstitutional
description: Melissa, Kate, & Leah get together again to discuss the Supreme Court’s decision in the Texas SB8 case, what is happening now in Texas, and what might happen still with the law.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
